sen.j: 押小路通（おしこうじどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Oshikoji-dori Street is an east-west running street of Kyoto City.
The Oshikoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
The Oshikoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は木屋町通から西は千本通まで、二条通と御池通の間を走る。
sen.e: It extends from the Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to the Senbon-dori Street in the west, running between the Nijo-dori Street and the Oike-dori Street.
It extends from Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Senbon-dori Street in the west, running between Nijo-dori Street and Oike-dori Street.
It extends from Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Senbon-dori Street in the west, running between Nijo-dori Street and Oike-dori Street.

sen.j: 千本通から西ではJR山陰本線の高架を斜めにくぐって御池通と接続する。
sen.e: West of the Senbon-dori Street it passes diagonally under the elevated railway of the JR Saninhonsen Line and is connected to the Oike-dori Street.
West of Senbon-dori Street it passes diagonally under the elevated railway of the JR Saninhonsen Line and is connected to Oike-dori Street.
West of Senbon-dori Street it passes diagonally under the elevated railway of the JR Sanin Main Line and is connected to Oike-dori Street.
sen.cmt: JR Sanin Main Lineとしました。

sen.j: 平安京の押小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Oshikoji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Oshikoji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Oshikoji of Heiankyo.

sen.j: 御池通の一本北にあり、二条城の南縁を画する通りである。
sen.e: It runs a block north of the Oike-dori Street and passes along the southern edge of the Nijo Castle.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: It runs a block north of Oike-dori Street and passes along southern edge of Nijo Castle.
It runs a block north of Oike-dori Street and passes along southern edge of Nijo-jo Castle.

sen.j: 堀川通～千本通は片道2車線の広い道路で、京都市営地下鉄東西線が地下を通っており、二条城前駅、二条駅がある。
sen.e: The section between the Horikawa-dori Street and the Senbon-dori Street is wide with 2 lanes in each direction, under which Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line runs with Nijojo-mae Station and Nijo Station.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The section between Horikawa-dori Street and Senbon-dori Street contains two wide lanes in each direction, under which Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line runs and where Nijojo-mae Station and Nijo Station are located as well.

The section between Horikawa-dori Street and Senbon-dori Street contains two wide lanes in each direction, under which Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line runs and where Nijojo-mae Station and Nijo Station are located as well.

sen.j: 高瀬川 (京都府)一之舟入 木屋町通
sen.e: Takase River (Kyoto Prefecture) Ichinofunairi, Kiyamachi-dori Street
Takase River (Kyoto Prefecture) Ichinofunairi, Kiyamachi-dori Street
Takase-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) Ichinofunairi, Kiyamachi-dori Street

sen.j: 京都市役所 河原町通（正面は反対側）
sen.e: Kyoto City Hall, Kawaramachi-dori Street
Kyoto City Hall, Kawaramachi-dori Street
Kyoto City Hall, Kawaramachi-dori Street (The main gate is on the opposite side.)
Nijo Castle, Horikawa-dori Street
Nijo Castle, Horikawa-dori Street
Nijo-jo Castle, Horikawa-dori Street

sen.j: 神泉苑 大宮通（正面は反対側）
sen.e: Shinsenen, Omiya-dori Street (The main gate is on the opposite side.)
Shinsenen, Omiya-dori Street (The main gate is on the opposite side.)
Shinsenen, Omiya-dori Street (The main gate is on the opposite side.)

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄東西線 - 二条城前駅 - 二条駅
sen.e: Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line - Nijojo-mae Station - Nijo Station
Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line - Nijojo-mae Station - Nijo Station
Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line - Nijojo-mae Station - Nijo Station

sen.j: 山陰本線（嵯峨野線） - 二条駅
sen.e: Saninhonsen Line (Sagano Line) - Nijo Station
Saninhonsen Line (Sagano Line) - Nijo Station
Sanin Main Line (Sagano Line) - Nijo Station
